attributes.action: deport family members of terrorists to country they support
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the goverment to look into the idea of sending any terrorists and there family, back to the country they have supported if and when they have been convicted of terrorist crimes in this country.
It will make them think twice 
about takeing the path of terrorism if confronted with the knowledge there families will be punished as well.
